text: Buchenavia is a genus of plant in family Combretaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Buchenavia grandis, Ducke * Buchenavia hoehneana, N. Mattos * Buchenavia iguaratensis, N. Mattos * Buchenavia kleinii, Exell * Buchenavia pabstii, Marq. & Val. * Buchenavia rabelloana, Mattos * Buchenavia tetraphylla, (Aubl.) R. A. Howard * Buchenavia tomentosa, Eichler * Buchenavia viridiflora, Ducke Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Buchenavia
